meta_info.name: DV_SCALE
meta_info.description: A data type that represents scale values, where there is:

functions.name: is_strictly_comparable_to
functions.meaning: Test if this Scale value is strictly comparable to `_other_`.

functions.name: less_than
functions.meaning: True if this Scale value is less than `_other_`.

attributes.name: symbol
attributes.description: Coded textual representation of this value in the scale range, which may be strings made from symbols or other enumerations of terms such as  `no breathlessness`, `very very slight`, `slight breathlessness`. Codes come from archetypes.

attributes.name: value
attributes.description: Real number value of Scale item.
